entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
AREAS OF FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

AREAS OF FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
